article_title: Bam-tastic! Amanda Carpenter sums up difference between Obamacare supporters and opponents – twitchy.com
article_text:
Bingo. Remember, it has already been resolved that the silly old Tea Party rubes knew it and the Smarter Than You elitists fell for the lies.

All these Dems coming out for "let them keep it" bills show they never bothered to understand Obamacare http://t.co/zQlsYmjucX — Amanda Carpenter (@amandacarpenter) November 13, 2013

Double bingo. The always awesome Amanda Carpenter, senior communications adviser to Sen. Cruz, then brought it all home with this win:

Want to know the difference between an Obamacare supporter and an Obamacare opponent? The opponents are the only ones who read the bill. — Amanda Carpenter (@amandacarpenter) November 13, 2013

Boom.

@amandacarpenter Those pesky facts. — Josh Carpenter (@katesdaddy3) November 13, 2013

Heh. And we don’t want to leave media lapdogs out of the train wreck mix:

@amandacarpenter Obama said his you-can-keep-it-lie almost 40 times. MSM repeated his you-can-keep-it-lie thousands of times. @conncarroll — Max (@MHB2012) November 13, 2013

Precisely. But, hey, they are super smart and stuff, plebs!

Related:

Dems ‘rattled’ by Obamacare train wreck: Really? Here’s why in one truth-slam

Truth-boom! RESOLVED: Tea Party rubes best Obamacare-gullible elites [pic]

Full Twitchy coverage of Amanda Carpenter
